resources.string:
<style type="text/css">
                      @font-face {font-family: helvetica;  src: url(\'file:///android_asset/fonts/SourceSansProRegular.ttf\'); }
            html, body { margin: 0; padding: 0; }
            body { font: normal 1em arial; color: #333333; line-height: 1.5; font-family: helvetica; padding-bottom: 50px;}
            h1 { font-weight: normal; font-size: 1.6em; color: #ad0303; }
            h2 { font-size: 1.2em; color: #000000; }
            h1, h2, ul, ol, p { margin: 1em 20px; }
            img { display: block; width: auto; margin: 1em 0; height: auto 100%; max-width: 100%; }
            img.hero { margin: 0; }
            div.heroDiv { height: 250px; overflow: hidden; }
            .heroDiv img.hero { height: initial;}
            p.caption { color: #999999; font-style: italic; }
            span.ref { background: #c6e3c5; padding: 3px 5px; border-radius: 2px; }
            table { width: 100%; border: 0; border-collapse: collapse; margin: 1em 0; border-top: solid 1px #eeeeee; margin: 20;}
            th, td { padding: 20px 10px; border-bottom: solid 1px #eeeeee; text-align: left; vertical-align: top; }
            th:first-child, td:first-child { padding-left: 20px; }
            th:last-child, td:last-child { padding-right: 20px; }
            th.rgt, td.rgt { text-align: right; }
            th { font-size: .8em; text-transform: uppercase; background: #eeeeee; }
            tr.hdr td { background: #fafafa; padding: 10px 20px; font-weight: bold; font-size: .8em;  }
            tr.bold { font-weight: bold; }
            td.fill { background-color: #cccccc; }
            table.calendar, table.small { font-size: .8em; }
            table.calendar td, table.calendar th { padding: 5px !important; border: solid 1px #eee; }
            td.indent { padding-left: 40px; }
            a { color: inherit; text-decoration:none; }
            a.disabled { pointer-events: none; }
        </style>
The App that connects you to farming equipment.
Register and login with your phone number.
We\'ll check to see if you already have an account.
Please complete the rest of the fields to register today.
Please enter the 4-digit code that was sent to your number by SMS.
I have read and agreed to the terms and conditions and privacy policy.
Please enter your cell number and we\'ll send you a verification code.
Please enter the 4-digit code that was sent via SMS and your new password.
Complete your profile information using the form below.
Choose how you would like to receive notifications about orders.
Check out the articles below to find our more about AgriShare and how to use the app.
Get in touch with the AgriShare team. We\'ll send your name and telephone number too.
Renting services is quick and easy. Just follow these four simple steps and get started today.
Choose service and pay with EcoCash
Offering services is quick and easy. Just follow these four simple steps and get started today.
Add your equipment and enter the information required
